alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 1:11AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL ITASCA, KOOCHICHING AND NORTHWESTERN ST. LOUIS COUNTIES THROUGH 145 AM CDT... At 111 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of International Falls, to near Big Falls, to near Northome, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... International Falls around 115 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Kabetogama and Kabetogama Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis
